description: Executes tests via various test tools; minitest, serverspec, inspec

test_tool.description: Test tool framework (gem) to use, eg. serverspec or inspec

test_tool_version.description: Test tool framework (gem) version to use, eg: '> 2.41.3'. Default is: '> 0' (latest)

tool_installed.description: Let the task know that the tool is already installed, don't install it

report_format.description: Reporter format, common formats include: documentation, json. (see specific gem (inspec/serverspec) docs for compatible reporter types)

test_file.description:
File or directory name of a test to execute. Relative to: /files/tests/<test_tool>/
 eg. web_server.rb. 
If the test_file parameter is not provided then this task will try to auto-detect 
target node's role using facter and use this value as the test file name, prepending the test_tool to it's path and appending '.rb' to it's name.

role.description: Target node's role - this task uses this value as the test file name, prepending the test_tool to it's path and appending '.rb' to the role name.
